DOC.criteria: Subject 18yrs older Subject singleton pregnancy Subject planning undergo chorionic villus sampling ( CVS ) and/or amniocentesis current pregnancy Subject able provide consent Subject pregnant one fetus Subject ( mother ) know aneuploidy Subject active malignancy require major surgery systemic chemotherapy history metastatic cancer . Subject already undergone CVS amniocentesis current pregnancy prior study enrollment .
